No ovo je demokracija. -Kad bipred grad stao neprijatelj......Rimljani su ukinuli demokracijui imenovali zastitnika grada.To nisu smatrali cascu,nego javnom sluzbom.Zadnji imenovani da stitiRepubliku zvao se Cezar......i nikad se nijeodrekao moci. -Pa, dobro.Ili umres kao junak......ili pozivis toliko davidis kakav nitkov postajes.Tko god Batman bio, svakako tone zeli raditi do kraja zivota.Kako i bi? Zacijelo trazinekoga da preuzme odgovornost.Nekoga poput vas, g. Dent?Mozda. Dorastao sam tome.sto ako je bas HarveyDent Skroviti krizar?Da se svaku noc iskradam,netko bi to vec primijetio.Mene ste kupili, Dent. Prireditcu prikupljanje sredstava.Lijepo, no reizbor mije tek za tri godine.Ne, ne shvacate.Jedno prikupljanje smojim prijateljima......i vise vam ne treba ni cent.Koji je to vrag?

А мислех, че моите шеги са лоши.Дай ми една причина, момчетата мида не ти отнесат главата.Какво ще кажеш за фокус?Ще накарам тази химикалка да изчезне.Изчезна!Между другото, костюмът ми не е евтин.Би трябвало да знаете, вие го купихте.Седни! Искам дачуя предложението му.Да върнем часовника година назад.Полицаите и адвокатите не смеехада безпокоят нито един от вас.Какво стана?Топките ли ви паднаха?Виждате ли, човек като мен...- Урод.Човек като мен... Слушайте.Знам защо предпочитатеда провеждате малките си,групови терапии денем.Знам защо се боитеда излизате нощем.Батман.Батман разкри на Готъмистинските ви лица, за нещастие.Дент е само началото.А колкото до така нареченияплан от телевизора...Батман нямал юрисдикция.Ще го открие и ще го накара да пищи.Познавам пискливците когато ги видя.Какво предлагаш?- Просто е. Ще убием Батман.Ако е толкова просто,защо не си го сторил вече?

Ta-da!It's...It's gone.Oh, and by the way,the suit, it wasn't cheap.-You ought to know, you bought it.-Sit.I want to hear proposition.Let's wind the clocks back a year.These cops and lawyerswouldn't dare cross any of you.I mean, what happened?Did your balls drop off? Hm?You see, a guy like me...-A freak.-Damn right.A guy like me... Look, listen.I know why you chooseto have your little, ahem......group-therapy sessionsin broad daylight.I know why you're afraidto go out at night.The Batman.See, Batman has shown Gothamyour true colors, unfortunately.Dent, he's just the beginning.And as for the television'sso-called plan......Batman has no jurisdiction.He'll find him and make him squeal.I know the squealers when I see them......and...What do you propose?It's simple. We, uh, kill the Batman.If it's so simple, why haven'tyou done it already?If you're good at something,never do it for free.How much you want?Uh, half.You're crazy.-No, I'm not.No, I'm not.If we don't deal with this now......soon......little Gambol here won't be ableto get a nickel for his grandma.Enough from the clown!

En wie zegt dat ze u niet pakken?En ik dacht dat mijn grappenslecht waren.Eйn reden waarom ik je nuniet laat onthoofden.Een goocheltrucje?Ik ga dit potlood laten verdwijnen.En weg is ie.En dat pak was niet goedkoop.Jullie hebben 't zelf betaald.Zitten.Ik wil voorstellen horen.We draaien de klok een jaartje terug.Toen durfde niemand jullie eenstrobreed in de weg te leggen.Wat is er gebeurd?Hebben jullie geen ballen meer?Kijk, een man als ik...Freak.Een man als ik...Luister, ik weet waaromjullie hebben gekozen......voor groepstherapie overdag.Ik weet waarom julliebang zijn in het donker.De Batman.Batman heeft Gothamjullie ware aard laten zien, helaas.Dent is nog maar het begin.

A ja mislio da su moji vicevi losi.Daj mi razlog zasto ti mojmomak ne bi odrubio glavu.Moze trik?Sredit cu da olovka nestane.Ona...Ode.Usput, odijelo nije bilo jeftino.Vi ste ga platili! -Sjedni...zelim cuti prijedlog.Vratimo satove godinu unatrag.Murja i odvjetnici ne bi sedrznuli ljutiti nikoga od vas.Pa sto se dogodilo?Otpala vam muda?Vidite, momak kao ja...Nakaza! -Tako je.Momak kao ja. Gledajte, slusajte.Znam zasto ste odluciliodrzavati svoje male......seanse grupneterapije sred bijela dana.Znam zasto se bojite izlaziti nocu.Batman.

Колко искаш?Половината.Ти си луд!- Не съм. Не, не съм!Ако не се договорим за това сега,скоро малкият ни Играчняма да може да спечели и цент.Достатъчно от клоуна!Нека да не избухваме.Мислиш, че можеш да крадешот нас и да ти се размине?Да.Давам награда от 500000,за главата на този клоун.Милион ако е жив,за да го науча първо на обноски.Добре. Защо не ми се обадите,когато започнете да гледатена нещата малко по-сериозно.Ето визитката ми.Труден си за откриване.Лау е на път за Хонконг.Ако беше помолил, можех да реагирам.Казах ти да ме държиш е течение.В трезора бяха оставенисамо маркирани пари.Знаели са, че идваме.Щом твоят офис се намеси...Офиса ми? Седиш си с отрепки катоУoртз и Рамирес, а ми говориш...Да, Гордън, почти уличихновобранеца ти за контрабанда.Не говори глупости, а докажи, че нямахора на Марони в офиса ти, Дент.Трябва да върнем Лау,но китайците не екстрадират свои,независимо от обвинението.Ако ти го доведа, можеш лида го накараш да говори?Ще го накарам да пее.Ще тръгнем след парите на мафията.Играта ще загрубее.

Mм ne! Proи jdete pro mм?Ne!Rachel! Rachel!Harvey...- Dobшe.- Rachel!Ne! Ne! Ne!Harvey, to nevadн.To je v poшбdku, poslouchej...Nмkterй...Ne, pojпte zpбtky!Rachel! Ne!Zdravнm.Joker utekl z MCU.I s Lauem?Joker mмl to,ћe ho chytнme, v plбnu.Ty jsi chtмl, abych ho nechal v MCU!

Shit!...this out of proportion.You think you can steal from usand just walk away?-Yeah.-I'm putting the word out.Five hundred grand for this clown dead.A million alive, so I can teach himsome manners first.All right. So, listen,why don't you give me a call......when you wanna start taking thingsa little more seriously?Here's my card.Mm-mm.You're a hard man to reach.Lau's halfway to Hong Kong.If you'd have asked,I could have taken his passport.All that was left in the vaultswere marked bills.They knew we were coming.As soon as your office got involved...My office?You're sitting down there with scum likeWuertz and Ramirez and you're talking...Oh, yeah. I almost had your rookiecold on a racketeering beat.Don't try and cloud the fact that clearlyMaroni's got people in your office, Dent.We need Lau back......but the Chinese won't extraditea national under any circumstances.If I get him to you,can you get him to talk?I'll get him to sing.We're going after the Mob's life savings.Things will get ugly.I knew the risk when I took this job,lieutenant.How will you get him back, any...?He does that.Our Chinese friends left townbefore I could tell them the deal was off.Well, I'm sure that you've alwayswanted to go to Hong Kong.What's wrong with a phone call?I think Mr. Lau deservesa more personal touch.Now, for high-altitude jumps......you're going to need oxygenand stabilizers.

Batman heeft geen rechtsgebied.En dan verlinkt hij jullie.Ik zie meteen wanneer iemandeen verlinker is en hij...Wat stel jij dan voor?Simpel, we doden de Batman.Waarom heb je datdan nog niet gedaan?Als je iets goed kan,doe je dat nooit voor niets.Hoeveel wil je?De helft.Je bent gek.-Nee, hoor.Helemaal niet.Als we dit nu niet tackelen,of gauw......dan kan de kleine Gambol nog geengrammetje voor z'n oma kopen.Ik ben klaar met die clown.Tut-tut-tut, laten we dit nou nietuit proportie......blazen.Denk je dat je ongestraftvan ons kunt stelen?500 ruggen op 't hoofd van die clown.Eйn miljoen levend.Dan kan ik hem 'n lesje leren.Okй, bel me dan maar......als jullie dit serieuswillen aanpakken, okй?Hier is mijn kaartje.Je bent lastig te pakken te krijgen.Lau is al halverwege Hong Kong.En ik had zo zijn paspoortin kunnen nemen.In de kluis lagen alleengemerkte biljetten.Ze hadden ons door.Toen jullie 't wisten...Wij? Jij werkt met gajesals Wuertz en Ramirez...

The Batman.See, Batman has shown Gothamyour true colors, unfortunately.Dent, he's just the beginning.And as for the... television'sso-called plan...Batman has no jurisdiction.He'll find himand make him squeal.I know the squealerswhen I see them...and...What do you propose?It's simple.We, uh, kill the Batman.If it's so simple, why haven'tyou done it already?If you're good at something,never do it for free.How much you want?Uh, half.- You're crazy.- I'm not.No, I'm not.If we... don't dealwith this now...soon...little, uh, Gambol here won't be ableto get a nickel for his grandma.Enough from the clown!Ah, ta-ta-ta-ta.Let's not blow...- Shit!- ...this out of proportion.You think you can stealfrom us and just walk away?- Yeah.- I'm putting the word out.Five hundred grandfor this clown dead.A million alive, so I canteach him some manners first.All right. So, listen,why don't you give me a callwhen you wanna starttaking things a little more seriously?Here's my card.Mm-mm.You're a hard manto reach.

Tйlйvision et son pseudo-plan,Batman n'a pas de juridiction.Il le trouvera et le fera jacter.Je sais reconnaоtre les jacteurs.Et...Tu proposes quoi ?C'est trиs simple.On tue le Batman.Si c'est si simple,pourquoi tu l'as pas fait ?Quand t'as un don,travaille pas gratis.Tu veux combien ?La moitiй.- T'es malade.- Non.C'est pas vrai.Si on rиgle pas зadиs maintenant,trиs vite,notre petit Gambolne pourra plus donnerun sou а sa grand-mиre.Ras-le-bol, du clown !N'explosons pasde colиre.Tu crois pouvoir nous voleret t'en sortir ?Je passe le mot :500 000 $ pour le clown mort.Un million vivant,que je le dresse d'abord.Trиs bien.Passez-moi un coup de filquand vous prendrez les chosesun peu plus au sйrieux.Je vous laisse ma carte.Vous кtes dur а joindre.Lau est en route pour Hong Kong.J'aurais pu bloquer son passeport.Vous deviez m'informer.

Nonappena и entrato in ballo il suo ufficio...Il mio ufficio?Lei se la fa con gentagliacome Wuertz e Rapire e dice...oh, giа, per poco non inchiodavo un suonovellino per complicitа con un racket.Non provi a coprire il fatto che Maroniha qualche infiltrato nei suo ufficio, Dent.Dobbiamo far tornare Lau...

Uejn.CIA kishte njл programnл '60-n......pлr tл marrл njerлzit e tyre ngavendet e nxehta tл quajtur Grepi i Qiellit.- Mund t'i hedhim njл sy.- Po.Mirл. Tani...Pjata Kavlari tл fortлmbi titanium, bashkл me......3 valлzime fibrepлr qлndrueshmлri.Do tл jesh mл i lehtл,mл i shpejtл dhe mл i zhdлrvjellлt.Mos duhet tл lexoshmл parл udhлzimet?- Po.- Tani, ka edhe njл kompromis.Ndarja e pjatave tл bлnmл tл kapshлm pлr thikat dhe plumbat.Ne s'duhet t'i bлjmл gjлrat tepлr tл lehta,tani, apo jo?Si do t'i rezistojл qenve?Po flet pлr Rotuelirлtapo Shiuauat?Mund t'i dalлpлr macet.Gjeta njл nл Arizona.Njл njeri shumл i mirл do ta vлrлnл punл pлr njл javл......dhe paguhetnл dorл.- Por pлr ekuipazhin e aeroplanit?- Kontrabandistлt e Koresл Jugore.Ata bлjnл flurime pлr nл Pjongengposhtл radarit.- Ke ndonjл justifikim?- Po.Besoj se kyлshtл aeroplani juaj, zotлri.Dukesh i lodhur, Alfred.Do tл jesh mirл pa mua?Nлse mund t'i thuash ruses pлr"masazhim tл kremit tлnd tл diellit".Gambol, dikush tл kлrkon.Thonл qл kanл vrarл Xholin.

Dent, on je tek pocetak.A sto se tice ovogatakozvanog TV-plana......Batman nema nadlestvo.Pronaci ce ga i natjerati da procvili.Prepoznajem cvilidrete kad ih ugledam......i...sto predlazes?Jednostavno. Ubijmo Batmana.Ako je tako jednostavno, zasto vec nisi?Ako si u necemu dobar,nikad to ne cini gratis.Koliko trazis?Pola.Ti si lud. -Ne, nisam.Ne, nisam.Ne pozabavimo li se time sada......uskoro......mali Gambol nece mocinabaviti ni grama za svoju bakicu.Dosta tog klauna!Nemojmo da se sve raspadne...Drek!...od prepucavanja.Mislis da nas mozespotkradati i odsetati?Da. -Neka se zna.500 somova za glavu ovoga klauna.Milijun za zivoga, da gaprvo mogu nauciti ponasanju.Dobro, cujte, lijepo me nazovite......kad pocnete sveshvacati mrvicu ozbiljnije.Evo moje posjetnice.Tesko je do tebe.Lau je na pola puta do Hong Konga.Mogao sam mu uzeti putovnicu.Rekoh vam da me ukljucite.U trezoru su ostalesamo oznacene novcanice!

Как ще го върнеш...Често го прави.Китайският приятел си е тръгнал,преди да му кажа, че сделката отпада.Сигурен съм, че винагиси искал да посетиш Хонконг.Не може ли да се обадя?Смятам, че г-н Лау заслужавапо-лично отношение.За скоковете от високо се нуждаетеот кислород и стабилизатори.Трябва да кажа, че се подготвихза обичайните ви желания.Скоковете от самолет са друго нещо.Как ще се върна на самолета?Ще трябва добра туристическа агенция.- А без приземяване?Това вече ми хареса, г-н Уейн.ЦРУ има програма за прибиранена агентите си от горещите точки,наречена "Небесна кука".Може да ви бъде полезна.Да.- Добре, сега...Закален, органичен полимер,облечен в титан, тройно обработен,с по-голяма гъвкавост.Ще бъдете по-лек, по-бърз, по-пъргав.Ще трябва да прочетете инструкциите.- Аха.Има и недостатък.Обособяването на частите ви правипо-уязвим за ножове и куршуми.Не искаме всичко да епрекалено лесно, нали?Колко ще издържи срещу кучета?Ротвайлери или чихуахуа?Ще издържи срещу всяка котка.Открих един в Аризона.Един много мил човек се съгласи, каза,че ще е готов до седмица и взима кеш.Ами екипажа за полета?- Южно-корейски контрабандисти.Летят към Пхенян подрадарите, през целия полет.Помисли ли за алиби?- О, да.

Malб snнdanм pro vбs.- Tak dobшe.- Alfrйde.Ano, pane Wayne?Zavinil jsem to s nн jб?Chtмl jsem v lidech vzbudit dobro.Ne љнlenstvн a smrt.Vzbudil jste v nic dobro, ale plivaljste do tvбшe Gothamskэch zloиincщ.To vбs nenapadlo,ћe to mщћe vйst ke ztrбtбm na ћivotech?Vмci se vћdycky zhorљн,neћ se zase zmмnн k lepљнmu.Ale Rachel, Alfrйde?Rachel vмшila v to,za co bojujete.V to, co zastupujeme.Gotham vбs potшebuje.Ne, Gotham potшebujeopravdovйho hrdinu.A jб jsem nechal toho vraha a psychopata,aby ho odrovnal.A proto jim prozatнmbudete muset staиit vy.Chtмla na mм poиkat, Alfrйde.Dent o tom nevн.Nikdy se to nesmн dozvмdмt.Co to je?To poиkб.Ten banditv barmskйm pralese...Chytili jste ho?- Ano.- Jak?Vypбlili jsme ten prales.

...jumping out of an airplaneis pretty straightforward.What about getting back into the plane?-I'd recommend a good travel agent.-Without it landing.Now, that's more like it, Mr. Wayne.The CIA had a programback in the '60s......for getting their people outof hot spots called Sky Hook.-We could look into that.-Yeah.Okay. Now...Hardened Kevlar platesover titanium-dipped......tri-weave fibers for flexibility.You'll be lighter, faster, more agile.Perhaps you shouldread the instructions first?-Yeah.-Now, there is a tradeoff.Separation of the plates makes youmore vulnerable to knives and gunfire.We wouldn't wanna make thingstoo easy, now, would we?How will it hold up against dogs?We talking rottweilers or Chihuahuas?Should do fine against cats.I found one in Arizona.A very nice man said he could have itup and running in a week......and he takes cash.-What about the flight crew?-South Korean smugglers.They run flights into Pyongyang,below radar.-Did you think of an alibi?-Oh, yes.I believe this is your plane, sir.You look tired, Alfred.You'll be all right without me?If you can tell me the Russian for"apply your own bloody suntan lotion."Yo, Gambol, somebody here for you.They say they've just killed the Joker.

Ga nou niet verhullen dat Maronimannetjes bij jullie heeft zitten.Lau moet terug, maar Chinalevert geen landgenoten uit.Als ik hem bezorg,krijg jij 'm dan aan de praat?Honderduit.We willen de maffia kaalplukken.En dat is best link.Dat wist ik toen ik hiervoor koos.Maar hoe krijg je hem...Doet ie altijd.Onze Chinese vrienden waren al wegvoordat ik kon afzeggen.Je wilde vast altijd al een keernaar Hong Kong.Waarom geen telefoontje?Mr Lau verdient persoonlijk aandacht.Bij grote hoogtes heb je zuurstofen stabilisators nodig.Vergeleken bij uw andere verzoeken......is uit een vliegtuig springenvrij simpel.En als ik het vliegtuig weer in wil?Ga naar een goed reisbureau.-Zonder te landen.Dat lijkt er meer op, Mr Wayne.De CIA had vroeger een methodeom mensen op te pikken. Sky Hook.Daar kunnen we 's naar kijken.Goed dan...Gehard kevlar in combinatie mettitaniumvezels voor flexibiliteit.Zo bent u lichter, snelleren behendiger.Misschien kunt u eerstde instructies lezen?Het nadeel is wel dat u kwetsbaarderbent voor messteken en kogels.Het moet niet te simpel worden.Is het bestand tegen honden?Rottweilers of Chihuahua's?Het kan wel tegen katten.Ik heb er een gevonden in Arizona.Het kan binnen een week vliegklaar zijnen de man wil cash.

If you'd have asked,I could have taken his passport.I told you to keep mein the loop.All that was left in the vaultswere marked bills.They knew we were coming.As soon as your office got involved...My office?You're sitting down there with scum likeWuertz and Ramirez and you're talking...Oh, yeah, Gordon. I almost hadyour rookie cold on a racketeering beat.Don't try and cloud the fact that clearlyMaroni's got people in your office, Dent.We need Lau back...but the Chinese won't extraditea national under any circumstances.If I get him to you,can you get him to talk?I'll get him to sing.Look, we're againstthe mob's life savings.Things will get ugly.I knew the risk whenI took this job, lieutenant.How will you get him back,any...?He does that.Our Chinese friends left town beforeI could tell 'em the deal was off.Well, I'm sure that you've alwayswanted to go to Hong Kong.What's wrongwith a phone call?I think Mr. Lau deservesa more... personal touch.Now, for high-altitude jumps,you're gonna need oxygenand stabilizers.Well, I must say,compared to your usual requests...jumping out of an airplaneis pretty straightforward.What about getting backinto the plane?- I'd recommend a good travel agent.- Without it landing.Now, that's morelike it, Mr. Wayne.The CIA had a programback in the '60s,for getting their people outof hot spots called Sky Hook.- We could look into that.- Yeah.Okay. Now...Hardened Kevlar platesover titanium-dippedtri-weave fibersfor flexibility.You'll be lighter,faster, more agile.Perhaps you shouldread the instructions first?- Yeah.- Now, there is a tradeoff.

Terade eemaldamineteeb teist haavatavama nugadele ja tulistamisele.Me ei taha, et asjad liiga lihtsad oleks.Kuidas see koertele vastu peab?Kas me rддgime rotveileritestvхi chihuahuadest?See peaks hдsti kassidega vastu saama.Leidsin ьhe Arizonas.Ьks tore mees ьtles, et saab sellenдdala jooksul tццle ja tahab sularaha.- Aga lennumeeskond?- Sхidutavad salakaubavedajaidLendavad madalalt.- Mхtlesid juba alibi vдlja?- Mхtlesin.ARMULAEV: MILJARDДR EEMALDUBKOOS VENE BALLETIGASee peaks teie lennuk olema.Sa nдed vдsinud vдlja, Alfred.Saad ilma minuta hakkama?Kui ьtlete, kuidas vene keeles цelda:"pane ise endale pдikesekreemi peale".Gambol, teile on kьlalisi.Nad ьtlesid, et on tapnud Jokkeri.Kuhu nad surnukeha panid?

- asiat muuttuvat rumiksi.- Tiesin riskit ottaessani tдmдn tyцn.Miten saat hдnet takaisin...Hдn tekee tuota.Kiinalainen ystдvдmme poistui kaupungista,ennen kuin ehdin sanoa sopimuksen purkamisesta.Olet varmasti aina halunnutkдydд Hongkongissa.Mitд vikaa puhelinsoitossa on?Herra Lau ansaitsee hiemanhenkilцkohtaisempaa opetusta.Korkealta hypдttдessд tarvitsethappisдiliцt ja vakaimet.Tдytyy sanoa, ettд normaaleihinpyyntцihinne verrattuna -lentokoneesta hyppддminenon melko suoraviivaista.Miten pддsen takaisin lentokoneeseen?- Suosittelen hyvдд matkatoimistoa.- Ilman koneen laskeutumista.Nyt alkaa kuulostaaparemmalta, herra Wayne.CIA:lla oli 60-luvulla Taivaskoukku-ohjelmavдkensд noutamiseksi vaarallisista paikoista.Voisitte perehtyд siihen.Karkaistuja teflon-teriдtitaanikдrjellд kuitujen seassa -paremman joustavuuden saavuttamiseksi.Olet kevyempi, nopeampi ja ketterдmpi.- Kenties teidдn pitдisi lukea ohjeet ensin.- Niin.Tдhдn sisдltyy kompromissi. Terien irrottaminentekee teistд haavoittuvaisemman tulitukselle.Emmehдn halua asioidenolevan liian helppoja.Miten tuo pдrjдд koiria vastaan?Puhummeko rottweilereistavai chihuahuoista?Se pдrjдд hyvin kissoja vastaan.Lentovene Arizonassa.Erдs mukava mies sanoi, ettд hдn saasen liikkeelle viikossa kдteistд vastaan.- Entд miehistц?- He kuljettivat salakuljettajia.He tekivдt lentojaPjongjangiin tutkien katveessa.- Keksitkц jo alibin?- Keksin.ESITYS PERUTTULEMMENLAIVA: MILJONДДRI POISTUUKOKO VENДLДISEN BALETIN KANSSA

Jika saya menangkapnya untukmu,dapatkah kamu membuatnya bicara?Saya akan membuatnya bernyanyi.Kita akan mengejar jaminan hidup para mafia.Keadaan akan semakin keruh.Saya tau resiko ketika saya memilih tugas ini,lieutenant.Bagaimana kamu akan menangkapnya...?Dia sering begitu.teman china kita pergi dari kotasebelum saya bilang perjanjiannya batal.Yah, saya selalu yakin kamu inginpergi ke Hong Kong.Kenapa tidak telepon saja?Saya pikir Mr. Lau layakmendapatkan sentuhan pribadi.FOX: Sekarang, untuk lompatan dari ketinggian......kamu akan perlu oxygendan stabilizers.yah, saya harus akui,dibandingkan dengan permintaanmu selama ini......melompat dari pesawatsangat terlalu biasa saja.BRUCE:bagaimana jika ingin kembali ke pesawat?- Saya anjurkan travel agen yang baik.- tanpa mendaratkan pesawatnya.Nah, itu baru ide bagus, tuan. Wayne.CIA dulu punya programdulu ditahun '60s......untuk menjemput orang merekadari tempat bahaya yg disebut Skyhook.- Kita bisa menggunakannya.- Yeah.Okay. Sekarang...Pelindung baju yang di keraskandengan lapisan titanium......tiga lapis fibers untuk flexibilitas.Anda akan lebih ringan, lebih cepat, lebih rapuh.Mungkin anda harusBaca petunjuk terlebih dahulu?- Yeah.- Sekarang, ada kelemahannya.Plat terpisah membuatmu lebih pekaterhadap pisau dan senjata api.Kita tidak mau membuat sesuatuterlalu mudah sekarang, bukan?Bagaimana itu bisa bertahan terhadap anjing?Kita ambil Rotweilers atau Chiuahuas?Ini tidak apa2 terhadap kucing.Aku temukan 1 di Arizona.Orang yang sangat baik berkata dia bisa dapatkandan mengerjakannya dalam seminggu dan dia dibayar.......dan dia cuma terima tunai.- Bagaimana dengan kru pesawat?- Penyeludup dari Korea Selatanmereka terbangke Pyongyang di bawah radar sepanjang jalan.- Apakah kamu temukan sebuah alibi?- Oh, iya.

Se io ve lo porto, potete farlo parlare?Io lo faccio cantare.Stiamo puntando ai risparmi della mafia.Le cose si metteranno maie.Conoscevo i rischi,quando ho assunto questo incarico.Come riuscirа a riportarlo qui in...?Fa sempre cosi.I nostri amici cinesi sono sparitiprima che cancellassi l’accordo.Scommetto che lei ha sempredesiderato andare a Hong Kong.Non basta una telefonata?Credo che il signor Laumeriti un tocco piщ personale.FOX: Per i lanci ad alta quota,le serviranno ossigeno e stabilizzatori.Devo dire che in confrontoalle richieste che fa di solito......saltare da un aereo in voloи piuttosto convenzionale.BRUCE:E se invece volessi risalire sull'aereo?- Le consiglio un buon agente di viaggi.- Senza che atterri.Ora si che la riconosco, signor Wayne.La CIA aveva un programmanegli anni 60......per tirar fuori gli agentida situazioni pericolose, lo Sky Hook.- Potremmo dargli un'occhiata.- Va bene.Okay. Ora...Placche di Kevlar su fibre a triplo stratocon un bagno di titanio per la flessibilitа.Sarа piщ leggera, piщ veloce e piщ agile.Forse и meglio leggere prima le istruzioni.- Giа.- Ma c'и una controindicazione.La separazione delle placche la rendepiщ vulnerabile a coltelli e armi da fuoco.Non vogliamo rendere le cosetroppo facili, no?Che resistenza ha contro i cani?Parliamo di rottweiler o di chihuahua?Dovrebbe andare bene contro i gatti.Ne ho trovato uno, in Arizona.Un tizio ha detto che puт metterlo a puntoentro una settimana e accetta contanti.- Come farа con l’equipaggio?- Contrabbandieri sud-coreani.Volano a Pyongyangal di sotto dei radar.- Hai pensato a un alibi?- Oh, si.SPETTACOLO CANCELLATO

Foks.Laut i vjen keq qл s'mundtл tл takojл sot.E kuptoj.

Moj?!Druzite se s olosem poputWuertza i Ramirez i pricate...A jednog od vasih gustera skorosam scepao zbog reketarenja.Ne prikrivajte cinjenicu daMaroni ima ljude u vasem uredu!Laua moramo vratiti......no Kinezi nikadanece izruciti svojega.Dopremim li vam ga ja,natjerat cete ga da govori?Meni ce pjevati!Napast cemo mafijaskuzivotnu usteрevinu.Bit ce gadno.Znao sam rizik kadsam preuzeo ovaj posao.Kako ga uopce kanite...?Stalno to radi.Nasi kineski prijatelji napustilisu grad prije naseg odgovora.Zacijelo ste oduvijekzeljeli posjetiti Hong Kong.sto fali telefonskom razgovoru?Drzim da g. Lau zavreрujeosobniji pristup.Za skok s visine trebajuvam kisik i stabilizatori.Moram priznati, za razliku odvasih uobicajenih zahtjeva......skok iz aviona jeprilicno jednostavan.A povratak u avion?Predlazem putnickogagenta. -Bez spustanja.To vec zvuci bolje.CIA je 60'-ih imala program......pod imenom Nebeska kuka zaizvlacenje ljudi iz skripca.Mozemo u to zaviriti. -Da.Dobro. Dakle...Kaljene plocice kevlarapreko troslojnih......vlakana pojacanihtitanom zbog elasticnosti.Bit cete laksi, brzi, okretniji.Da prvo procitate upute?Da. -Postoji ustupak...Razdvajanje plocica cini vasosjetljivijim na noz i metak.Ne zelimo valjda da bude odvec lako.Koliko je otporno na pse?Rotvajlere ili civave?

Изглеждаш уморен, Алфред.Ще се справиш ли без мен?Как е на руски: "Ползвайтеси собствения, скапан лосион!"?Играч, търсят те.Твърдят, че са убили Жокера.И носят тялото.Мъртъв, значи 500000.А ако е жив?Искаш ли да знаешкак получих белезите?Баща ми беше алкохолик...и гадняр.Една вечер откачиповече от обикновено.Мама взе кухненскиянож за да се защити.На него не му хареса,ни най-малко.И така, аз гледах,татко взе ножа от нея,смеейки се ехидно.Обърна се към мен и каза:"Защо си толкова сериозен, сине?"Приближи се към мен с ножа."Защо си толкова сериозен?"Притисна острието към устата ми."Нека сложим усмивкана това лице. "И...Защо сте толкова сериозни?И така, операцията ни е малка,

a tvrdн, ћe иekal jak to jen љlo,aby udмlal Batman sprбvnou vмc.Teп se rozhodl vzнt tuto zбleћitostdo vlastnнch rukou.V 17:00 budeme vysнlat naћivoo skuteиnй identitм Batmana.Mrzн mм to s Rachel.Doktor шнkб, ћe mбte ukrutnй bolesti,ale nechcete si vzнt ћбdnй lйky.Ћe odmнtбte...pшнjmout darovanou kщћi.Vzpomнnбte si na tu pшezdнvku,kterou jste mм vљichni nazэvalikdyћ jsem pracoval naVnitшnнch zбleћitostech?Co to bylo, Gordone?Harvey...Шekni to.Шekni to!"Two-Face", Harvey, "Two-face"...Proи bych mмl skrэvatkdo jsem?Nevмdмl jsem, ћe ses mм snaћil varovat.Mrzн mм to.Vyzvedl tм Wuertz...Pracoval pro nм?Vнљ kdo vyzvedl Rachel?Harvey, potшebuju vмdмt, kterйmu z mэchlidн mщћu vмшit.Proи bys mм najednou poslouchal?Mrzн mм to, Harvey.Ne.Nemrzн.Jeљtм ne.To je љнlenstvн.Zaљlo to pшнliљ daleko.Na to jsi mмl myslet,neћ jsi otevшel tu skшнтku s klaunem.

So, dead, that's 500.How about alive? Hm?You wanna know how I got these scars?My father was......a drinker......and a fiend.And one night,he goes off crazier than usual.Mommy gets the kitchen knifeto defend herself.He doesn't like that......not one bit.So, me watching......he takes the knife to her,laughing while he does it.He turns to me and he says:"Why so serious?"He comes at me with the knife."Why so serious?"He sticks the blade in my mouth."Let's put a smile on that face."And...Why so serious?Now......our operation is small......but there is a lot of potential......for aggressive expansion.So which of you fine gentlemenwould like to join our team?Oh. There's only one spot openright now, so we're gonna have......tryouts.Make it fast.Welcome to Hong Kong, Mr. Fox.Mr. Lau regrets he is unableto greet you in person today.I understand.

Ze zeggen datze de Joker hebben afgemaakt.Ze hebben z'n lijk.Dood. Dat is 500.En levend?Weet je hoe ik aan die littekens kom?Mijn vader was een drinker......en agressief.Op een nacht was ie nogagressiever dan anders.Mam pakte het keukenmesom zich te verdedigen.Dat beviel hem niet.Voor geen meter.En terwijl ik toekijk......steekt ie haar met dat mes.En hij lacht erbij.Hij draait zich naar mij en zegt:

Hmm?Kamu mau tahu caranyaaku dapatkan goresan ini?Ayahku dulu......seorang peminum......dan seperti setan.Suatu malam,dia lebih gila dari biasanya.Ibu ambil pisau dapur untuk pertahanannya.Dia tidak suka itu......tidak sedikitpun.Jadi, aku melihat......dia ambil pisaunya dari ibuku,tertawa sambil dia melakukannya.Dia berbalik padaku dan dia bilang:"mengapa terlalu serius?"Dia menghampiriku dengan pisau."Mengapa terlalu serius?"dia mengayunkanpisaunya ke mulutku."Mari Taruh senyuman di wajah itu!"Dan...Mengapa terlalu serius?Sekarang......operasi kita kecil...

Nasao sam jedan u Arizoni.covjek ga obecao osposobiti zatjedan dana, a prima gotovinu.A posada? -Juznokorejski krijumcari.Stalno lete za Pjongjangispod dohvata radara.Smislili ste mi alibi? -O, da.NASTUP OTKAZANBrod ljubavi: Milijarder utekaos cjelokupnim Ruskim baletomDrzim da je to vas avion.Izgledas umoran, Alfrede.Bit ces dobro bez mene?Ako kazete kako se ruski veli:"Mazi se sama vrazjom losionom."Gambole, netko te trazi. Кой от вас, изискани джентълмени,би желал да се присъедини към отбора?Мястото е само едно.Да си направим състезание.И по-бързо.Добре дошли в Хонконг, г-н Фокс.Г- н Лау се извинява,че не можа да ви посрещне лично.Разбирам.От съображения за сигурност, ви моля,да оставите на съхранение телефона ви.Разбира се.Моля за извинение, че напуснахГотъм по средата на преговорите.Получи се малконедоразумение с полицията.Не мога да позволя нещо подобнода застраши компанията ми.Разбира се.- Но като бизнесмен от класа,вие го разбирате.Вече сте тук и можем да продължим.Оценявам положените усилияда ме доведете тук, г-н Лау...Тук не са позволени мобилни телефони.- Съжалявам, забравих, че е у мен.Дойдох за да ви съобщя,че сделката трябва да бъде анулирана.Не можем да си позволим,да свържат бизнеса ни с...в каквото и да сте обвинен. Сигуренсъм, че бизнесмен като вас ще разбере.Г- н Фокс, мисля, че обикновенопозвъняване щеше да е достатъчно.Г- н Уейн не би желал да помислите,че безцелно е пропилял времето ви.По една случайност, го пропиля.Добре казано, г-н Лау.Случайност. Много добре.Извинете, сър.

Both of you.Sit down.The public likes you. That's theonly reason that this might fly.But that means it's on you.They're all gonna come after you now,and not just the Mob.Politicians, journalists, cops.Anyone whose wallet'sabout to get lighter.Are you up to it? You'd better be.Because they get anything on you......and those criminals are back on thestreets, followed swiftly by you and me.Jesus!

The money is the only reasonI'm still alive.Oh, you mean, when they find outthat you've helped us,they're gonna kill you?- Are you threatening my client?- No.I'm just assuming your client'scooperation with this investigation.As will everyone.No? Okay.Enjoy your timein County, Mr. Lau.Wait!I won't give you the money...but I will give youmy clients. All of them.You'rea glorified accountant.What could you possibly haveon all of them that we could charge?I'm good with calculation.I handled all their investments.One big pot.Got it.One minute.RICO. If they pooledtheir money,we can charge themas one criminal conspiracy.Charge them with what?In a RICO case, if you can chargeone of the conspirators with a felony...You can charge all of themwith it. That's great.Mr. Lau.What kind of details do you haveabout this communal fund?- Ledgers...?- Immunity, protection- and a chartered plane back to Hong Kong.- After you testify in open court.And I'm just curious.With all your clients locked up...what's gonna happenwith all that money?Like I said,I'm good with calculation.He can't go to County.I'll keep him here in the holding cells.What is this, Gordon,your fortress?Well, you trust them overat County?I don't trust them here.Lau stays.Put word out.We hire the clown.He was right.We have to fix real problem.Batman.

Дайте ни парите и ще се договорим.Парите са единственатапричина да съм още жив.Искате да кажете, че когато разберат,че ни помагате, ще ви убият?Да не заплашвате клиента ми?- Не, просто убеждавам клиента ви,да съдейства за разследването.Което ще бъде добре за всички.Не? Добре.Приятно изкарване в затвора, г-н Лау.Почакайте!Няма да ви дам парите,но ще ви дам клиентите си.Всички.Бяхте виден счетоводител.С какво може да разполагате,за да ги обвиним?Добър съм в сметките.Управлявах всички инвестициикато общ пакет.- Пипнахме го.Един момент.Да действаме. Ако изтеглят парите си,можем да обвиним всички в заговор.На какво основание?В делата за укриване на данъциможеш да ги обвиниш по отделно...Или всички заедно. Страхотно!Господин Лау,с какви подробности разполагате затози фонд? Счетоводни книжа, отчети...Имунитет, защита ичартърен самолет до Хонконг.След като свидетелствате пред съда.Само от любопитство -след като клиентите ви бъдат осъдени,какво ще стане с всички пари?Както казах,добър съм със сметките.Не може да отиде в окръжния.Ще го държа под надзор тук.- Това тук да не е крепост, Гордън?По-сигурно ли е в окръжния?Просто не мисля, че тук е сигурно.Лау остава.Ясно е, ще наемем клоуна.Беше прав, трябва да се погрижимза истинският проблем.Батман.

Geef ons het geldin ruil voor een deal.Het geld is de reden dat ik nog leef.Dus als ze erachter komendat u ons helpt, gaat u eraan?Bedreigt u mijn cliлnt?Nee, ik neem aan dat uw cliлntmeewerkt aan het onderzoek.Zoals iedereen.Niet?Veel plezier in de gevangenis, Mr Lau.Wacht.Ik geef u geen geld, maar welde namen van al mijn cliлnten.U was een veredelde boekhouder.Wat heeft u voor belastend bewijstegen ze?Ik kan goed rekenen.Ik heb al hun investeringen gedaan.Eйn grote pot.Hebbes.Ogenblikje.We kunnen gaan vooreen criminele organisatie.En beschuldigen van wat?Als je er onder RICO ййn kanbeschuldigen...Heb je ze allemaal. Perfect.Mr Lau.Wat heeft u voor bewijsmiddelen?Kasboeken, notebooks?Bescherming en een vluchtnaar Hong Kong.Dan moet u eerst getuigen.En als al uw cliлnten vastzitten......wat gebeurt er dan met het geld?Zoals ik al zei,ik kan goed rekenen.Hij kan niet naar de gevangenis.Ik hou 'm wel hier in de cel.Is dit je eigen fort, Gordon?Vertrouw jij de gevangenis dan?-Ik vertrouw ze hier niet.Lau blijft.Ik geef door dat we de clown inhuren.Hij had gelijk.We moeten eerst dit oplossen.

You sure you wanna embarrass mein front of my friends, lieutenant?Oh, don't worry.They're coming too.Have a nice trip.See you next fall.Seven hundredtwelve counts of extortion.Eight hundred and forty-ninecounts of racketeering.Two hundred and forty-sixcounts of fraud.Eighty-seven countsof conspiracy murder.Five hundred and twenty-sevencounts of obstruction of justice.How do the defendants plead?Order in the court.Five hundred and forty-ninecriminals at once.How did you convince Surrilloto hear this farce?She shares my enthusiasmfor justice. After all, she is a judge.Well, even if you blow enough smoketo get convictions out of Surrillo,you're gonna set a new recordat appeals for quickest kick in the ass.It won't matter.The head guys make bail, sure.But the mid-level guys,they can't.They can't afford to be off the streetslong enough for trial and appeal.They'll cut deals thatinclude some jail time.Think of all you could dowith 18 months of clean streets.- Mr. Mayor, you can't...- No, get out. Both of you.Sit down.The public likes you. That's theonly reason that this might fly.But that means it's on you.They're all gonna come after you now,and not just the mob.Politicians, journalists, cops.Anyone whose wallet'sabout to get lighter.Are you up to it?You'd better be.Because they getanything on you...and those criminals are back on thestreets, followed swiftly by you and me.Jesus!

Seperti orang lainnya.Tidak? Baiklah.Nikmati waktumu di tahanan luar Tuan Lau.LAU:Tunggu!aku tidak akan berikanmu uangnya.......Tapi aku akan berikan kamu klienku,semuanya.Kamu akuntan yang muliaapa yang kamu mungkinbisa lakukan pada mereka semua, kita bisa tuntut?Aku bagus dalam perhitungan,aku tangani semua investasi mereka.1 pot besar.Mengerti.1 menit..RICO. Jika mereka mengumpulkan semua uangnya......kita bisa tuntut mereka semua berkomplotan.Tuntut mereka dengan apa?Dalam kasus Rico, jika kamu bisa menuntut salah 1dari komplotan dengan tindak pidana...menuntut mereka semua bersamaan, itu hebat.Tuan Laurincian macam apatentang dana bersama ini?- Buku besar...?- Kekebalan, perlindungan......pesawat untuk balik ke Hong Kong.- Setelah kamu bersaksi di pengadilan terbuka.Dan aku hanya curiga,jika semua klien anda di penjara......Apa yang terjadi dengan semua uangnya?Seperti yang aku bilang,aku bagus dalam perhitungan.Dia tidak bisa pergi ke penjara.Aku taruh dia di sini dalam sel tahanan.Apa ini Gordon, bentengmu?Apakah kamu percaya penjaga di penjara?Aku tidak percaya orang-orang siniLau tetap di sini.Kamu yakin mau memalukan akudi depan teman2ku Letnan?Tidak, jangan khawatir,mereka ikut juga.

RACHEL: Va bene, ci dia i soldie possiamo parlare di un accordo.Quei soldi sono l’unico motivoper cui sono ancora vivo.Vuoi dire che quando scoprirannoche ci ha aiutato, la uccideranno?- Sta minacciando il mio cliente?- No.Do solo per scontata la collaborazionedel suo cliente con questa indagine.Come faranno tutti.No? D'accordo.Si goda la sua vacanza in galera,signor Lau.LAU:Aspetti!Non vi darт i soldi......ma vi darт i miei clienti, tutti quanti.Lei era solo un semplice ragioniere.Che puт mai sapere su tutti loroche possa servire per incriminarli?Sono molto bravo con i calcoli.Ho gestito tutti i loro investimenti.Parliamo di un bel capitale.Ho trovato.Un minuto.La legge RICO. Se hanno messoinsieme i soldi, possiamo incriminarli.Incriminarli di cosa?In un'accusa per associazione a delinquere,se incastri uno per un certo reato...Puoi incriminare anche gli altri.E' magnifico.Signor Lau.Che tipo di dettagli ha su questodeposito in comune dei suoi clienti?- Registri?- Immunitа, protezione......un aereo per tornare a Hong Kong.- Dopo che avrа testimoniato in tribunale.Mi tolga una curiositа.Con tutti i suoi clienti al fresco......che fine faranno tutti quei soldi?Come ho giа detto,sono bravo a fare i calcoli.Non possiamo trasferirlo.Lo tengo qui nelle nostre celle.Che cos'и, Gordon, la sua fortezza?Lei si fida della prigione della contea?Non mi fido di qui.Lau non si muove.Non conosco i dettaglidel viaggio del signor Lau......ma sono contento che sia tornato.Spargete la voce. Assoldiamo il clown.Aveva ragione.Dobbiamo sistemare il vero problema.Batman.

Dhe pse mendon se duhettл bлj festл pлr Harvi Dentin?Mendova se ishte arsyeja juaj e zakonshmepлr shoqлri pлrveз meje......dhe fundлrrinлs sл Gotamit:......Pлr t'i lлnл pлrshtypjeZonjushes Dous.Shumл shakaxhi, por shumл gabim.Nл fakt, лshtл Denti.Policia dha copa skeniketл gjetura nл trup.Shikues tл ndjeshлm, bлni kujdes.Imazhi лshtл shqetлsues.Thuaju emrin tлnd.Brajan Dagllas.E jeni ju Batmanii vлrtetл?- Jo.- Jo?- Jo.- Jo?Atлherл pse visheshsi ai?Sepse ai лshtл njл simbol qл ne s'kemipse trembemi nga njл fundлrrinл si ty.Po. Ke, Brajan.Vлrtet qл ke.Po?Pra, ti mendon se Batmanie ka bлrл Gotamin njл vend mл tл mirл?Shikomл.Shikomл!E shikon, kaq tл зmendure ka bлrл Batmani Gotamin.Do rregull nл Gotam.Batmani duhet ta heqл maskлne tij dhe tл shkojл nл burg.Dhe зdo ditл qл refuzon,njerлzit vdesin,duke filluar qл sonte.Jam njeriqл e mbaj fjalлn.Harvi Dent,kamzhiku i kriminelлve......tmerri i brigadлssл fondeve.- Kthehem pлrsлri.- Rakela.Pak pije pлr kurajo,Z. Dent?- Faleminderit. Alfred, po?- Po, zotлri.Rakela flet gjithл kohлs pлr ju.Ti e ke njohur gjithл jetлn.Ende jo, zotлri.Ndonjл ish tл dashur psikopatnga i cili duhet tл ruhem?Ti nuk e ke idenл.

Dajte nam novac, pa cemo o nagodbi.Novac je jedini razlogzasto sam jos ziv.Mislis, ubit ce te doznajuli da si nam pomogao?Prijetite sticeniku? -Ne.Samo pretpostavljam dace suraрivati u istrazi.Kao i ostali.Ne? Dobro.Ugodan boravak u Okruznom, g. Lau.cekajte!Novac vam ne dam......ali cu vam dati svoje klijente, sve.Bili ste preuvelicani racunovoрa.Ma sto vi to znate cimebismo ih mogli optuziti?Dobro racunam. Vodiosam sva njihova ulaganja.Jedan veliki cup.Znam!Trenutak.Reket. Ako su udruzili novac,optuzimo ih kao zlocinacku urotu.cime?Po Zakonu o reketu,optuzbom jednoga urotnika...Mozes optuziti i ostale! Sjajno.G. Lau.Kakvim detaljima raspolazeteo tom zajednickom fondu?Knjige, biljeznice?-Imunitet, zastita......i avion do HongKonga. -Nakon svjedocenja.Znatizelje radi, kad vamklijenti odu u zatvor......sto ce biti s tim novcem?Kako rekoh, dobro racunam.Ne moze u Okruzni. Zadrzatcu ga ovdje u istraznom.sto, ovo je vasa tvrрava, Gordone?A vi vjerujete onima u Okruznom?Ne vjerujem ovima.Lau ostaje.Razglasi. Unajmit cemo klauna.Imao je pravo. Moramorijesiti pravi problem...

Нашето момче изглеждадобре по телевизията.Лейтенант, сигурен ли сте, че искатеда ме безпокоите пред приятелите ми?Не, не се тревожете.И те идват с вас.Приятно пътуване.Ще се видим на следващата спирка.87 случая за заговор и убийство...527 случая на възпрепятстванена правосъдието.Какво пледират обвиняемите?Ред в залата!- 549 обвиняеми наведнъж.Как убедихте Сурилода приеме този фарс?Тя споделя ентусиазма ми къмправосъдието, все пак е съдия.Дори и да вдигнете достатъчно шуми да издействате обвинения от Сурило,ще поставите нов рекордза най-големи досадници.Няма значение, едрите риби си плащатгаранциите, но дребните не могат.Не могат да си позволятда бъдат далеч от улицата,така че ще приемат сделки,за да намалят присъдите си.Помислете за перспективатаулиците да бъдат чисти 18 месеца.Г- н кмет, не можете...- Излезте. И двамата.Седнете.Хората ви харесват. Единственатавероятна причина за успех.Но това означава, че поемате цялататежест. Всички ще са по петите ви.Не само мафията.Политици, журналисти, полицаи.Всеки, чийто портфейл ще олекне.Готов ли сте за това?Дано да сте,защото ако открият нещо срещу вас,а престъпницитесе върнат по улиците,ще погнат и двама ни.

nikdo nezpanikaшн.Protoћe to je souибstн plбnu.Ale kdyћ шeknu, ћe zemшejeden malэ starэ starosta,tak vљichni zaиnou љнlet!Zaveп troљku anarchie,zamбvej zavedenэm шбdema vљechno se obrбtн v chaos.Jsem vyslancem chaosu.A vнљ jak se to mб s chaosem?Je spravedlivэ.Budeљ ћнt...Zemшeљ.To je шeи.Pane Reesi...Pan Wayne, ћe ano?To byl odvбћnэ иin,co jste prбvм udмlal.Snaћil jsem se stihnout zelenou na semaforu.Vy jste nechrбnil tu dodбvku?Proи? Kdo v nн je?Nemyslнte, ћe bych mмl jнt do nemocnice?Vy moc zprбvy nesledujete,ћe pane Wayne?

I'm glad to seethat you all got started without me.Now, where is Harvey? Where...?Harvey Dent, the man of the hour.Where's Rachel Dawes?She is my oldest friend. Come here.When Rachel first told me shewas dating Harvey Dent......I had one thing to say:"The guy from those God-awfulcampaign commercials?""I believe in Harvey Dent."Yeah, nice slogan, Harvey.But it caught Rachel's attention.And then I started to pay attentionto Harvey......and all that he's been doingas our new DA.And you know what?I believe in Harvey Dent.I believe that on his watch,Gotham can feel......a little safer, a little more optimistic.Look at this face. This is the faceof Gotham's bright future.To Harvey Dent. Let's hear it for him.Harvey.Harvey may not know youwell enough......to understand you'remaking fun of him......but I do.-No, I meant every word.You know that daythat you once told me about......when Gotham would no longerneed Batman?-It's coming.-Bruce.-You can't ask me to wait for that.-It's happening now. Harvey is that hero.He locked up half of the city's criminals,and he did it without wearing a mask.Gotham needs a hero with a face.You can throw a party, Wayne,I'll give you that.Thanks again.You mind if I borrow Rachel?Lieutenant, that joker cardpinned to the body?Forensics found three sets of DNA.-Any matches?-All three.The DNA belongs to Judge Surrillo,Harvey Dent and Commissioner Loeb.The Joker's telling uswho he's targeting.Get a unit over to Surrillo's house.Tell Wuertz to find Dent.

Onze vriend doet het goed op tv.Wilt u mij voor schut zettenwaar mijn vrienden bij zijn?Nee, die gaan ook mee.Goeie reis. Tot na de zomer.Hoe heb je Surrillo zo ver gekregen?Ze is net zo voor het recht als ik.Daarom is ze ook rechter.Ook al komt het toteen veroordeling......dan gaan ze meteen in beroep.De toppers krijgen een borgsom.Maar het middenkader niet.En die willen niet zo lang wachten.Dus gaan ze voor een schikking.18 maanden lang schone straten.Burgemeester...-Naar buiten. Allebei.Ga zitten.De burgers mogen je. Dat is de enige redendat dit misschien lukt. Het is aan jou.Je krijgt ze allemaal op je dak.Niet alleen de maffia.Politici, journalisten, dienders.Iedereen die in zijn portemonneegeraakt wordt.Ik hoop dat je er klaar voor bent.Want als ze iets belastends vinden......dan staan die boeven weer op straat,gevolgd door ons.

And why do you think I wannahold a party for Harvey Dent?Oh, I assumed it was your usual reasonfor socializing beyond myselfand the scumof Gotham's underbelly.To try to impress Miss Dawes.That's very droll, but very wrong.Actually, it's, uh, it's Dent.Harvey Dent,scourge of the underworld,scared stiff bythe trust-fund brigade.- I'll be back.- Rachel.A little liquid courage,Mr. Dent?- Thank you. Alfred, right?- That's right, sir.Yeah. Rachel talks about you all the time.You-you've known her her whole life.Not yet, sir.

Surrillo accepted'instruire cette farce ?Elle aime la justice, comme moi.Aprиs tout, elle est juge.Mкme si vous lui soutirezdes condamnations,vous sauterezen un rien de temps en appel.Peu importe.Les caпds paieront leur caution,mais les voyous ne pourront pas.Pour retourner dealer jusqu'а l'appel,ils nйgocieront et feront de la prison.Imaginez des rues proprespendant 18 mois.M. le Maire...Dehors. Tous les deux.Asseyez-vous.Le public vous aime.C'est un avantage.Mais зa vous retombera dessus.Vous serez la cible de tous.Pas que de la pиgre.Politiciens,journalistes,flics.Tous ceux qui y perdront des plumes.Vous rйsisterez ?Il y a intйrкt,car s'ils trouventquelque chose sur vous,les criminels seront remisdans les rues.Vous et moi aussi.

bagaimana kamu meyakinkanSurrillo untuk mendengar lelucon ini?Dia berbagi dengan antusiasku demi keadilan,lagipula dia sepenuhnya adalah hakim.Meskipun jika kamu menghembuskan banyak asapuntuk keluar dari hukuman Surrillo......kamu akan membuat rekor barudalam memohon pembelaan..Itu tidak masalahSi kepala sebagai jaminan, tentu,tapi untuk orang perantara, mereka tidak bisa.Mereka tidak bisa di lepasMereka akan mebatalkan janjitermasuk waktu untuk di penjara.Pikirkan hal yg bisa dilakukanselama 18 bulan jalanan akan bersih..LOEB: Tuan Walikota, kamu tidak bisa...- Tidak, Keluar, kalian ber-2.Duduk.Semua orang menyukaimu. Itulah satu-satuya alasanhal ini akan terlaksana.Tapi itu artinya resiko ada padamumereka semua mengincarmu sekarang.dan tidak hanya mafia.politisi, wartawan, polisi.Semua orang yang dompetnyaikut kena dampaknya.Apakah kamu siap? Sebaiknya iya.Karena mereka akan menguntitmu......dan penjahat2 itu kembali ke jalanandiikuti dengan cepat olehmu dan aku.Jesus![SIRENS WAILING]ALFRED: Aku pikir pengumpulan danamuakan jadi sukses besar, Pak.BRUCE: Dan mengapa kamu berpikir aku maumembuat pesta untuk Harvey Dent?

Mi vuole mettere in imbarazzodavanti ai miei amici, tenente?Oh, non si preoccupi.Vengono anche loro.STEPHENS:Buon viaggio. Ci vediamo tra un po'.DONNA:712 capi d'accusa per estorsione.849 capi d'accusa per racket.246 capi d'accusa per truffa.87 capi d'accusa per concorso in omicidio.527 capi d'accusaper aver ostacolato la giustizia.Come si dichiarano gli imputati?(BRUSIO CONCITATO)Ordine in aula.SINDACO:549 criminali in una volta.Come ha fatto a convincere Surrillo,a presiedere questa farsa?Condivide il mio entusiasmo perla giustizia. Dopo tutto, и un giudice.Anche se alza un polverone taleda convincere Surrillo......batterа il record in corte d'appello.Non importa.I capi pagheranno la cauzione, certo.Ma i pesci piccoli non possono.E non possono stare via dalla strada.Patteggeranno e resterannoun po' in galera.Pensi a quante cose puт farecon 18 mesi di strade pulite.LOEB: Signor sindaco, non puт...- No, fuori. Tutti e due.Si sieda.Lei piace alla gente. E' l’unico motivoper cui potrebbe funzionare.Ma se ne assume il carico.Le staranno tutti alle costole,e non solo la mafia.Politici, giornalisti, poliziotti.Tutti quelli che si troverannoil portafoglio piщ leggero.E' pronto a sostenerlo? Sarа meglio.Se trovano un solo appiglio su di lei......quei criminali torneranno per la strada,seguiti a ruota da lei e da me.Gesщ!(SIRENE)

Gлzohem tл shoh se e keni filluarpa mua.Tani, ku лshtл Harvi?Ku...?Harvi Dent, njeri i nderit.Ku лshtл Rakela Dous?Ajo лshtл mikja imee vjetлr. Eja kлtu.Kur Rakela mл tha pлr herл tл parлqл po dilte me Harvi Dentin......i thashл vetлmnjл gjл:..."Ai tipi i atyre reklamavetл shpifura tл fushatave?""Unл besoj nл Harvi Dent"Po, sllogan i bukur, Harvi.Por i bлri pлrshtypje Rakelлs.Dhe mл pas unл fillovatл mл pлlqente Harvi......dhe nл gjithзka qл ai po bлnsi prokurori ynл i ri.Dhe e dini зfarл?Unл besoj nл Harvi Dentin.Unл besoj se nлn mbrojtjen e tij,Gotami mund tл ndihet......pak mл i sigurtл,me pak mл shumл optimizлm.Shikoni fytyrлn e tij. Kjo лshtл fytyrae tл ardhmes sл ndritur tл Gotamit.Pлr Harvi Dentin.Tл dлgjojmл prej tij.Harvi.Harvi mund tл mostл tл njohл aq mirл......pлr tл kuptuar qлpo bлn shaka me tл...- por unл po.- Jo, unл e kisha seriozisht.Ti e di atл ditлpлr tл cilлn mл fole njлherл......kur Gotami s'do tл kishtenevojл pлr Batmanin?- Po vjen.- Brus.- Ti s'mund tл mл kлrkosh tл pres pлr kлtл.- Po ndodh tani. Harvi лshtл ai hero.Ai futi brenda gjysmлn e kriminelлve tлqytetit dhe e bлri pa vлnл njл maskл.Gotamit i nevojitetnjл hero me njл fytyrл.Ti mund tл festosh, Uejn,unл do tл ta jap atл.Faleminderit pлrsлri.Mund ta marr Rakelлn?Leitnant, ajo letra e xholite ngulur tek trupi?Testet nxorrлntre grupe ADN-sh.- Ndonjл pлrputhje?- Qл tл treja.ADN-ja i pлrket Gjykatлsit Surilo,Harvi Dentit dhe Komisionerit Loeb.Xholi po na tregonse kл ka si objektiv.Nxirr njл njлsi mbi shtлpinл e Surilos.Thuaji Uertzit tл gjejл Dentin.

Kako ste uvjerili Surrilloda saslusa tu farsu?Dijelimo zanos premapravdi. Napokon, sutkinja je.cak i ako uspijete odSurrillo izvuci osude......postavit cete novi rekordna Prizivnom u pusioni.Nije vazno. Glavesinece van uz jamcevinu, da.Ali oni srednji ne mogu.A ne mogu si priustiti veci izostanaks ulice. Nagodit ce se i guliti.A zamislite sto se sve mozeu 18 mjeseci cistih ulica.Gradonacelnice... -Ne, van. Obojica.Sjednite.Javnost vas voli. Jedinozbog toga to mozda i upali.Ali sve je na vama.Sad ce se oboriti navas. I ne samo mafija.Politicari, novinari, murja.Svi kojima ce olaksati lisnica.Dorasli ste tomu? Bolje za vas da jeste.Jer naрu li vam ista......ti ce kriminalci natrag naulicu, a potom i nas dvojica.Isuse!

Смятам, че с партито за набиранена средства ще постигнете голям успех.И защо смяташ, че искамда организирам парти за Харви Дент?Предполагам, както обикновено,защото обичате обществото,като оставим настранамен и отрепките на Готъм.Възможност да впечатлите мис Доус.- Много забавно, но грешите.Всъщност става въпрос за Дент.Харви Дент,кошмарът на подземния свят,вцепенен от страх от организиранотов негова чест парти. Сега се връщам.Рейчъл...- Едно питие за кураж, г-н Дент?Алфред, нали?- Точно така, сър.Рейчъл говори за вас постоянно.Сигурно знаете всичко за нея?Все още не, сър.

Gothamskб vљeobecnб.- Evakuovali jste budovu?- Jo.Musнme vмdмt, jak odtamtud odjeli...Jeli po silnici.Pane, zrovna teп chybн 50 lidн.Jeden autobus.Vљechny tyto dalљн autobusy pшijelyz jinэch nemocnic.Podle mэch odhadщ nбm jeden chybн.A kde je podle tvэch odhadщ Harvey Dent?Hledejte dбl a nechte si to pro sebe.Kdyћ se nмkdo zeptб,tak jsme ho zachrбnili.Zavolejte starostovi,aќ pшijede.Budeme potшebovat Nбrodnн gardu.Dobrэ boћe.Nemмl bys tam bэt......a nмco dмlat?Mбm volno.Musнm si odskoиit.

-City hall.-Seal the building.-No one in or out till I get there.-Got it.Gordon. What are you up to?We're secure. I want a floor-by-floorsearch of the entire building.We believe the Joker'smade a threat against your life.These are dangerous people.You're not giving mea lot of information.Even we don't knowwhere you're going.Take the envelope, get in, open it.It'll tell you where you're headed.You can't leave me alonewith these people.The whole Mob's after youand you're worried about these guys?Compared to this,the Mob doesn't scare me.Gordon, you're unlikely to discover thisfor yourself, so......take my word, the police commissionerearns a lot of threats.I found the appropriate responseto these situations a long time ago.Them gunning for youmakes you see things clearly.Yeah, I bet.Yeah. It makes you think about thingsyou couldn't stand losing......about who you wannaspend your life with.-That's a pretty big commitment.-Not if the Mob has their way.You get to explain to my wife......why I'm late for dinner.Sir, the joker cardhad traces of your DNA on it.-Don't do that.-All right.-Let's be serious, then.-Okay.What's your answer?I don't have an answer.How'd they get my DNA?Somebody with accessto your office or house......must have lifted a tissueor a glass... Wait! Wait!-Well, I guess no answer is a no.-Harvey.-It's someone else, isn't it?-Harvey.Just tell me it's not Wayne.The guy's a complete f...

Alfred, toch?-Ja, meneer.Jij kent Rachel al haar hele leven.-Nog niet, meneer.

О, не можете да си представите!Съжалявам, че закъснях.Радвам се, че сте започнали без мен.И така, къде е Харви?Къде е Харви Дент, човекът,за когото всички говорят?Къде е Рейчъл Доус? Тя е моястара приятелка. Ела тук.Когато за пръв път Рейчъл ми каза,че се среща с Харви Дент,казах само едно:"Човекът, който бе на онзи ужасенафиш: Аз вярвам в Харви Дент? "Чудесен лозунг, Харви.Привлече вниманието на Рейчъл. Тогаваи аз насочих вниманието си към Харви.Към всичко, което прави като областенпрокурор. И знаете ли какво?Аз вярвам в Харви Дент.Вярвам, че докато той бди, Готъме изпълнен с повече сигурност.Повече оптимизъм...Погледнете това лице. Това лицее светлото бъдеще на Готъм.За Харви Дент.Аплодисменти.Харви не те познава достатъчно,за да знае кога му се подиграваш,но аз те познавам добре.- Не, всяка дума беше искрена.Помниш ли, когато ми каза, че Готъмняма да се нуждае от Батман дълго?Този ден наближава.- Брус, не можеш да ме молиш да чакам.Вече се случва. Харви е герой.Арестува половинатапрестъпници и то без да носи маска.Готъм се нуждае от герой без маска.Знаеш как да организираш партита,Уейн, признавам ти го.Благодаря ти още веднъж.

Mбm ti hojнt otшepat?Ahoj.Dente.Boћe.Myslel jsem, ћe jsi mrtvэ.Jen napщl.Kdo vyzvedl Rachel, Wuertzi?Museli to bэt lidi od Maroniho.Drћ hubu!Chceљ mi шнct, ћe budeљ krэttoho druhйho zrбdce v Gordonovм jednotce?Nevнm, nikdy mi to neшekl!Hele Dente, pшнsahбm bohu, ћe jsemnevмdмl, co ti udмlajн.To je zvlбљtnн...Protoћe jб taky nevнm,co se s tebou stane.Skvмlй, ћe?Skvмlй?Neetickй.Nebezpeиnй.Promмnil jste kaћdэ telefonv Gothamu v mikrofon.A pшijнmaи vysokэch frekvencн z jejich zdrojщ.Sebral jste mщj koncept sonarua aplikoval jste ho nakaћdэ mobil ve mмstм.S pщlkou mмsta zбsobujнcнho informacemi vбљ sonarmщћete vidмt celэ Gotham.To nenн sprбvnй.Musнm ho najнt, Luciusi.Za jakou cenu?Databбze je zamknutб a zaљifrovanб.Pшнstup k nн mбpouze jedna osoba.To je na jednoho иlovмkapшнliљ moci.Proto jsem ji svмшil tobм.Mщћeљ to pouћнvat jenom ty .Љpehovanн 30 miliуnщ lidнnenн v popisu mй prбce.Tady je zvukovб ukбzka.Kdyћ bude mluvit v rбmci mмstas nмkэm z jeho lidнbudeљ schopnэ triangulovat jeho pozici.Doufбm, ћe jen jen jednou.Ale povaћujte to za mou rezignaci.Dokud bude tento pшнstrojve Wayne Enterprisestak jб budu pryи.Aћ skonинљ,zadej tam svй jmйno.

Oh, shit.Get a medic!They've come for him.We made it.Stay hidden.Good evening, ladies and gentlemen.We are tonight's entertainment.I only have one question:Where is Harvey Dent?You know where Harvey is?You know who he is?Hands up, pretty boy.Do you know where I can find Harvey?I need to talk to him.Just something little, huh? No.What's going on out there? Wayne!Oh, thank God, you'vegot a panic room.Hey, wait...Oh, you gotta be kidding me.You know, I'll settle for his loved ones.We're not intimidated by thugs.You know......you remind me of my father.I hated my father.Okay, stop.Well, hello, beautiful.You must be Harvey's squeeze. Hm?And you are beautiful.You look nervous. Is it the scars?

Sorry dat ik laat ben.Gelukkig zijn jullie al begonnen.Waar is Harvey?Harvey Dent, onze eregast.Waar is Rachel Dawes?Mijn oudste vriend. Kom hier.Toen Rachel zei dat ze met Harveyging, zei ik:Die van die vreselijke commercials?Ik geloof in Harvey Dent.Goeie slogan, hoor.Maar Rachels oog viel erop.En ik ging ook op Harvey letten......en wat hij doet als officier.En weten jullie wat?Ik geloof in Harvey Dent.Ik geloof dat Gotham onder hem......zich veiliger kan voelen.Optimistischer.Kijk eens naar zijn gezicht.Het gezicht van Gothams toekomst.Applaus voor Harvey Dent.Harvey weet niet wanneerje hem in de maling neemt......maar ik wel.-Nee, elk woord was gemeend.Je zei tochdat eens de dag zou komen......dat Gothamgeen Batman nodig heeft?Daar ga ik niet op wachten.Het komt eraan.Harvey is die held.Hij sluit criminelen open zonder masker.Gotham wil een held met 'n gezicht.Jij weet wat party's zijn, Wayne.Nogmaals bedankt.Mag ik Rachel even lenen?Inspecteur, op die speelkaartzaten drie DNA-sporen.Geпdentificeerd?-Alle drie.Van rechter Surrillo,Harvey Dent en commissaris Loeb.

Thanks again.You mind ifI borrow Rachel?Lieutenant, that joker cardpinned to the body?Forensics foundthree sets of DNA.- Any matches?- All three.The DNA belongs to Judge Surrillo,Harvey Dent and commissioner Loeb.The Joker's telling uswho he's targeting.Get a unit over to Surrillo's house.Tell Wuertz to find Dent.Get them both under protective custody.Where's the commissioner?- City hall.- Seal the building.- No one in or out till I get there.- Got it.Gordon.What are you up to?We're secure. I want a floor-by-floorsearch of the entire building.Sorry, sir. We believe the Joker'smade a threat against your life.These aredangerous people, Judge.Yeah, but you're not giving mea awful lot of information.Even we don't knowwhere you're going.Take the envelope, get in, open it.It'll tell you where you're headed.You cannot leave me alonewith these people.The whole mob's after youand you're worried about these guys?Yeah, compared to this,the mob doesn't scare me.Gordon, you're unlikelyto discover this for yourself, so, uh...take my word, the police commissionerearns a lot of threats.I found the... appropriate responseto these situations a long time ago.Them gunning for youmakes you see things clearly.Yeah, I bet.Yeah. It makes you think about thingsyou couldn't stand losing...about who you wannaspend your life with.- That's a pretty big commitment.- No, not if the mob has their way.You get to explainto my wife...why I'm late for dinner,lieutenant.Sir, the joker cardhad traces of your DNA on it.- Don't do that.- All right.

Dimana...?Harvey Dent, Orang penting jam ini!dimana Rachel Dawes?dia teman lamaku, ke sini.Ketika Rachel pertama bilang padaku bahwa diamengencani Harvey Dent......ada 1 hal yang aku katakan:"Laki-laki yang melakukan kampanyeterjelek itu?""aku percaya pada Harvey Dent"Yeah, slogan yang bagus, Harvey.tapi kamu bisa menarik perhatian Rachel.Lalu aku mulai menarik perhatian ke Harvey......dan semua yang dia telahlakukan sebagai DA baru kita.Dan tahukah anda?aku percaya Harvey Dent.Aku yakin dalam pengamatannyaGotham akan merasa......sedikit lebih aman, Sedikit lebih optimis.Lihat pada wajah ini, inilahwajah masa depan Gotham yang cerah.Untuk Harvey Dent. Ayo bersorak untuknya.MAN:Harvey.Harvey mungkin tidak tahu banyak tentangmu......untuk mengerti bahwa kamu mempermainkan dia......tapi aku tahu.- Tidak, saya sungguh jujur di perkataanku.Kamu tahu hari itu yang kamu pernah bilang padaku......saat Gotham tidak lagi membutuhkan Batman?- Saat itu sudah datang.- Bruce.- Kamu tidak bisa memintaku untuk menunggu itu.- Sudah terjadi sekarang. Harvey adalah pahlawan itu.Dia mengamankan 1/2 penjahat kota,dan dia melakukannya tanpa memakai topeng.Gotham butuh pahlawan dengan wajah.DENT: Kamu pintar membuat pesta, Wayne,Saya akui itu.Terima kasih lagi.Kamu tidak keberatan aku pinjam Rachel?Letnan, kartu Joker itudi jepit ke mayat?Ahli forensik menemukan 3 set DNA.- Ada yang cocok?- Ketiga tiganya.DNA punya hakim Surrillo,Harvey Dent, dan Komisaris Loeb.Joker memberitahu kitasiapa yang dia incar.bawa 1 unit ke rumah Surrillo.katakan Wuertz untuk menemukan Dent.

Oh, piщ di quanto possa immaginare!(TURBINIO DI ELICOTTERO)BRUCE: Scusate il ritardo......ma mi fa piacere vedereche avete iniziato anche senza di me.Ora, dov'и il nostro Harvey?Dov'и...?Harvey Dent, l’uomo del momento.E dov'и Rachel Dawes?La mia piщ vecchia amica.Vieni qui.Quando Rachel mi ha raccontatoche usciva con Harvey Dent......ho detto una sola cosa:"Il tipo che ha fattoquegli spot agghiaccianti?""Io credo in Harvey Dent".Si, bello slogan, Harvey.Ma ha colpito Rachel.E cosi ho cominciatoa prestare attenzione a Harvey......e a quello che ha fattocome nuovo procuratore.E sapete che vi dico?Io credo in Harvey Dent.Io credo che sotto la sua tutela,Gotham potrа sentirsi......un po' piщ sicura,un po' piщ ottimista.Guardatelo in faccia. Questo и il votodel brillante futuro di Gotham.Harvey Dent, facciamogli un applauso.UOMO:Harvey.Harvey forse non ti conosce abbastanzaper capire quando lo prendi in giro......ma io si, invece.- No, ero convinto di ogni parola.Ti ricordi quando una voltami hai detto che un giorno......Gotham non avrebbepiщ avuto bisogno di Batman?- Sta per arrivare.- Bruce.Non puoi chiedermidi aspettare quel giorno.Sta succedendo adesso. E' Harvey l’eroe.Ha messo in gabbia metа dei criminalidella cittа e l’ha fatto senza una maschera.Gotham ha bisognodi un eroe con un voto.DENT: Organizza delle belle feste,Wayne, gliene do atto.Grazie ancora.

Dreq o punл!Njл ambulancл!Ata kanл ardhurpлr tл.Ia arritлm.Qлndro i fshehur.Mirлmbrлma,zonja dhe zotлrinj.Ne jemi zbavitjae mbrлmjes.Kam vetлm njл pyetje:Ku лshtл Harvi Dent?Ti e di se ku лshtл Harvi Dent?E di se ku лshtл?Duart lart,djalл i bukur!Mos e dini se ku mund ta gjej Harvin?Duhet tл flas me tл.Thjesht diзka tл vogлl, hл?Jo.Зfarл po ndodh atje?Uejn!Falл Zotit, ke gjeturnjл dhomл paniku.Prit...Ti po bлn shaka me mua.E dini зfarл,mл mjaftojnл njerлzit e tij.Ne nuk trembeminga vrasлs.E di зfarл......ti mл kujtonbabain tim.E urreja babain tim.Mirл, ndalo.Pлrshлndetje, bukuroshe.Ti duhet tл jeshe dashura e Harvit.Dhe qenke e bukur.Dukesh nervoze.Mos janл vragat?Do qл ta dishsesi i kam?

Da se cuvam kojegpsihoticnog bivseg decka?Pojma nemate!Oprostite sto kasnim. Dragomi je da ste poceli bez mene.No gdje je Harvey?Harvey Dent, covjek trenutka.A Rachel Dawes?Najstarija prijateljica. Doрi...Kad mi je Rachel rekla daizlazi s Dentom, rekoh samo:"Onaj s groznih izbornih reklama?""Vjerujem u Harveya Denta".Da, lijep slogan, Harvey.No zapeo Rachel za oko.Onda sam i ja poceoobracati pozornost......svemu sto Harvey cinikao novi okruzni tuzitelj.I znate sto?Ja vjerujem u Harveya Denta.Drzim da se pod njegovim budnimokom Gotham moze osjecati......malo sigurnije, malo optimisticnije.Pogledajte to lice. To je liceGothamove vedre buducnosti.Nazdravimo Harveyu Dentu. Molim pljesak.Harvey.Harvey te ne zna dovoljnoda shvati kad mu se rugas......ali ja da. -Mislio sam svaku rijec!Znas, dan o kojemu si pricala......kad Gotham vise nece trebati Batmana?Daj dan se blizi. -Bruce.Ne trazi da ga cekam. -To sevec dogaрa. Harvey je taj junak.Zatvorio je polovicu gradskihkriminalaca, i to bez krinke.

Лейтенант, онази жокер-карта, коятобе върху трупа, откриха 3 вида ДНК.Съвпадения?- Три от три. Съдия Сурило,Харви Дент и шефа на полицията Лоуб.- Жокера ни показва мишените си.Изпрати хора да пазят къщата наСурило. Кажи на Уортз да открие Дент.Сложете ги под полицейска опека.- Комисарят е в кметството.Подсигурете сградата. Никой да невлиза или излиза докато не дойда.Гордън! Какви ги вършиш?- Обезопасяваме.Искам цялата сграда да сепретърси, етаж по етаж.Извинете, сър, смятаме, че Жокеравъзнамерява да ви убие.Тези хора са опасни, съдия.- Да, но информацията ви е оскъдна.Дори ние не знаем къде отивате.- Вземете плика, отворете гои ще разберете къде отивате.Не можеш да меоставиш сам с тези хора.Цялата мафия те преследва,а ти се притесняваш от тях?В сравнение с това тук,мафията не е страшна.Гордън, вероятно нямакак да го знаеш, така че,повярвай ми, като полицейскикомисар, получавам много заплахи.Намерих решение за подобноположение много отдавна.Когато стрелят по теб, започвашда виждаш всичко по-ясно.Обзалагам се.Замисляш се за нещата,които не можеш да загубиш.Например с кого искашда прекараш остатъка от живота си.Това е сериозно обвързване.- Не и ако мафията успее да ме докопа.Ще трябва да обясниш на съпругата мизащо закъснявам за вечеря.Сър, по картата от Жокераимаше следи от вашето ДНК.Не го прави.- Добре.Да бъдем сериозни тогава.- Добре.Какъв е отговорът ти?Нямам отговор.

Nepшipadajн v ъvahu.A dбlnice na vэchod?Je ucpanб uћ pбr hodin.Takћe nбm zщstбvajн jen trajekty s 30 000lidmi pшipravenэmi se nalodit.A to chci jeљtм nмkterй trajekty pouћнtk pшepravм vмzтщ z ostrova.Ty lidi kterэch jste se chtмl zbavit?- Z tмch si hlavu nedмlбm.- To byste mмl.Aќ uћ Joker chystб cokoli,je dobrб љance, ћe do toho zahrnul i Harveyho zloиince.Chci je odsud dostat.Tak kde je Harvey?Nenaљli jsme ho.Paneboћe.Jak dlouho to dokбћetedrћet pod pokliиkou?Nezastavuj policajtщm, na semaforech,prostм nikde.Jedeљ za ћenou?Milujeљ ji?Jo.Napadlo tм nмkdy jakй by to bylo,kdybys ji slyљel umнrat?S tнm bмћ za Jokerem.To on zabil tvou ћenskou.To on z tebe udмlal, co jsi.Joker je jen vzteklэ pes.Chci toho, kdo ho vypustil.O Wuertze jsem se postaral,ale kdo je ten druhэ,koho mбљ u Gordona v jednotce?Kdo vyzvedl Rachel? Musel to bэt nмkdo,komu vмшila.Kdyћ ti to шeknu,nechбљ mм jнt?Nepшipravil bych tм pшece o љanci.Byla to Ramirezovб.- Ale шekls pшece...- ...ћe tм nepшipravнm o љanci.Mбљ љtмstн.- Ale on ne.- Kdo?

Come here. Hey.Look at me.So I had a wife.She was beautiful, like you......who tells me I worry too much......who tells me I ought to smile more......who gambles and gets in deepwith the sharks. Hey.One day they carve her face.And we have no money for surgeries.She can't take it.I just wanna see her smile again. Hm?I just want her to knowthat I don't care about the scars.So......I stick a razor in my mouthand do this......to myself.And you know what?She can't stand the sight of me.She leaves.Now I see the funny side.Now I'm always smiling.You got a little fight in you. I like that.Then you're gonna love me.Drop the gun.Oh, sure. You just take offyour little mask......and show us all whoyou really are. Hm?Let her go.Very poor choice of words.

Stuur een wagen naar Surrilloen Wuertz naar Dent.Waar is de commissaris?-Gemeentehuis.Laat niemand erin of eruit.Gordon, wat doe je?Sluit alles af.Laat elke verdieping doorzoeken.We denken dat de Joker u bedreigt.Het zijn gevaarlijke mensen.-Je vertelt me erg weinig.Zelfs wij kennen uw bestemming niet.Maak de envelop in de auto open.Daar staat alles in.Laat me niet alleen met deze mensen.De maffia zit achter je aanen nu ben je bang?De maffia is minder eng.Gordon, ik denk nietdat je dit ooit zult ervaren......maar een commissariswordt heel vaak bedreigd.En ik weet al heel langwat ik dan moet doen.Je gaat dingen helderder zien.-Dat zal best.Je gaat nadenken over de dingendie je niet wilt verliezen.Met wie je je leven wilt delen.Dat is nogal een belofte.-Niet als het aan de maffia ligt.Jij mag mijn vrouw uitleggenwaarom ik te laat voor het eten ben.Op de kaart van de Joker zit uw DNA.Niet doen.Even serieus.Wat is je antwoord?Ik heb geen antwoord.Hoe komen ze aan mijn DNA?Iemand die bij u thuis of op uw werkkomt, heeft een glas... Wacht.

Merci encore.Je vous emprunte Rachel ?Sur la carte fixйe sur le cadavre,on a trouvй trois ADN.- Identifiйs ?- Tous.Ceux de la juge Surrillo,de Dent et du commissaire Loeb.Le Joker nous indique ses cibles.Envoyez une йquipechez Surrillo.Que Wuertz trouve Dent.Mettez-les en prйventive.- Le commissaire ?- А la mairie.Bouclez l'immeuble.Personne n'entre ou sort.Gordon.- C'est quoi, ce bordel ?- On sйcurise.Fouillez tous les йtages.Dйsolй, nous pensons que le Jokerveut vous tuer.- Ces gens sont dangereux.- Vous m'en dites trop peu.On ignore oщ vous allez.Prenez l'enveloppe, dйmarrez,la destination est а l'intйrieur.Tu ne peux pas me laisser seul ici.Tu as la pиgre а tes trousseset tu crains ces gens-lа ?А cфtй,la pиgre ne me fait pas peur.Gordon,je vais vous apprendre une chose.Croyez-moi sur parole,un commissaireest souvent menacй.J'ai trouvй...la rйponse adйquateil y a bien longtemps.Ces menaces de mortt'ouvrent les yeux.Oui, sans doute.Tu vois mieuxce que tu ne voudrais pas perdre.Et avec quitu veux passer ta vie.- C'est un gros engagement.- Pas si la pиgre rйussit son coup.Vous expliquerez а ma femme...la raison de mon retard.Le Joker a laissй une carteavec votre ADN.Ne fais pas зa.D'accord.

Nehmen Sie beide in Schutzhaft.Und wo ist der Commissioner?- Im Rathaus.- Riegeln Sie's ab.- Keiner darf rein oder raus, bis ich da bin.- Ok.Gordon! Was soll denn das eigentlich?Hier sind wir sicher. Jede Etagedurchsuchen. Das ganze Gebдude.Tut mir leid Sir, wir glauben,dass der Joker ein Attentat auf Sie vorhat.Diese Leute sind gefдhrlich, Euer Ehren.Ja, aber das ist alles, was Sie mir sagen.Nicht einmal wir wissen,wo Sie hin sollen.Nehmen Sie den Umschlag,steigen Sie einund цffnen Sie ihn.Da steht, wo's hingeht.Lass mich nicht allein mitdiesen Leuten hier rumstehen!Die ganze Mafia ist hinter dir her, unddu machst dir Sorgen wegen dieser Leute?Ja, vor der Mafia hab ich,verglichen hiermit, keine Angst.Gordon, Sie werden es selbstwahrscheinlich nie erleben, deshalbglauben Sie's mir. Ein Police Commissionerbekommt hдufiger Drohungen.Ich habe die angemessene Reaktionauf solche Momente schonvor langer Zeit gefunden.Durch so eine Bedrohung sieht mandie Dinge auch klarer.Auf jeden Fall.Ja. Vogliouna perquisizione dell'intero edificio.Riteniamo che Jokerstia minacciando la sua vita.E' gente pericolosa.- Non и che mi diate molte informazioni.- Neanche noi sappiamo dove deve andare.Prenda la busta, salga e la apra.E saprа dove andare.Non puoi lasciarmi da solocon queste persone.Hai tutta la mafia alle costolee ti preoccupi di questa gente?In confronto a questo,la mafia non mi fa paura.Gordon, non credo chearriverа mai a scoprirlo, quindi......mi creda sulla parola, un commissariodi polizia riceve molte minacce.Ho trovato la risposta piщ giustaa queste situazioni parecchio tempo fa.Quando rischi la vitavedi tutto con piщ chiarezza.Si, lo immagino.Giа. или дома ви, трябва да е взелваша дреха, или чаша... Hej to nenн fйr,na tй lodi jsme mмli bэt my!Chcete cestovat s nimi?Posluћte si.Pane, oni vypnuli motory.Dobшe. Vem vysнlaиku a шekni jim,ћe je vyzvednemehned jak vyklopнme tu chбtru.Davide, tady Bird, ozvi se.Co to sakra je?Liberty, ozvмte se. Pшepнnбm.Je to hluchй.

Let's not do that again.-Is Harvey okay?-He's safe.Thank you.Jim, it's over.As long as they don't get to Lau,we've cut off their funds.The prosecution's over.Nobody's standing upin front of a judge......while judges and police commissionersare getting blown away.-What about Dent?-He's got any sense......Dent's halfway to Mex...So where do you keep your trash?You're due in court. I need you alivelong enough to get you on the record.You can't protect me.You can't even protect yourselves.You refuse to cooperate, you're notcoming back here, you go to County.How long do you calculateyou'll last in there?Targeting me won't get their money.I knew the Mob wouldn't godown easily......but this is different.They crossed a line.You crossed the line first.You squeezed them, you hammered themto the point of desperation.And in their desperation, they turned toa man they didn't fully understand.Criminals aren't complicated, Alfred.We just need to figure outwhat he's after.With respect, Master Wayne......perhaps this is a manyou don't fully understand either.A long time ago, I was in Burma......and my friends and I were workingfor the local government.They were trying to buythe loyalty of tribal leaders......by bribing them withprecious stones......but their caravans were being raidedin a forest north of Rangoon by a bandit.So we went looking for the stones.But in six months, we nevermet anyone who traded with him.One day, I saw a childplaying with a ruby......the size of a tangerine.The bandit had beenthrowing them away.-So why steal them?-Because he thought it was good sport.Because some men aren't lookingfor anything logical, like money.They can't be bought, bullied,reasoned or negotiated with.Some men just wannawatch the world burn.

Er is een ander, hи?Zeg niet dat het Wayne is.Die man is volkomen...Wat doe je?BOVENBel een dokter.Ze komen voor hem.We zijn er.Verstop je.Goedenavond, dames en heren.Wij zorgen voor het entertainment.Ik heb ййn vraag.Waar is Harvey Dent?Weet jij waar Harvey is?Handen omhoog.Weet jij waar Harvey is?Ik moet een dingetje bespreken.Wat gebeurt daar? Wayne.Je hebt gelukkig een veilige ruimte.-Je kan niet...Dat meen je niet.Dan doe ik het met zijn geliefden.We laten ons niet intimideren.Weet je......je doet me aan m'n vader denken.Ik haatte mijn vader.

Ти трябва да сикатеричката на Харви.И си красива.Изглеждаш нервна.Заради белезите ли е?Искаш ли да знаеш как ги получих?Ела тук... погледни ме.Имах съпруга, красива, като теб,която ми казваше,че се тревожа прекалено.Която ми казваше,че трябва да се усмихвам повече.Обичаше да си играекато се гмуркаше с акулите.Един ден те обезобразиха лицето й.И нямахме пари за хирург.Тя не можеше да го понесе.Просто исках да видяусмивката й отново.Исках само да знае, че не меинтересуват белезите. Така че...Притиснах бръснача до устата сии си причиних това.Сам.И знаеш ли какво?Тя не можеше да ме погледне!Тръгна си.Но вече виждам забавната страна.Сега постоянно се усмихвам!У теб се крие един малък боец!Това ми харесва.- Значи мен ще ме заобичаш!Хвърли пистолета.- О, да, разбира се!

Check the names."Richard Dent.""Patrick Harvey."Harvey Dent.I need 10 minutes with the scenebefore your men contaminate it.It's because of youthese guys are dead...Detective!Give us a minute, guys.That's brick underneath.Gonna take ballisticsoff a shattered bullet?No.Fingerprints.Whatever you're gonna do, do it fast.Because we found his next target.He's put it in tomorrow's paper.I'm not sureyou made it loud enough, sir.What can I do for you, Mr. Reese?You wanted me to do the diligenceon the LSI Holdings deal again.Well, I found some irregularities.Their CEO is in police custody.No, not with their numbers, with yours.Applied Sciences. Whole divisionof Wayne Enterprises......just disappeared overnight.

Jij bent vast Harveys mokkel.En je bent beeldschoon.Wat doe je zenuwachtig.Komt het door de littekens?Wil je weten hoe ik eraan kom?Kom hier.Kijk me aan.Ik had een vrouw.Ze was mooi, net als jij.Ze zegt dat ik te veel pieker.En dat ik meer moet lachen.Ze gokt en ze heeft enorme schulden.Op een dag bewerken ze haar gezicht.We hebben geen geld voor chirurgie.Ze kan er niet tegen.Ik wil haar weer zien lachen.Ze moet weten dat ikdie littekens niet erg vind.Ik steek een scheermesin mijn mond en doe dit......bij mezelf.En wat denk je?Ze kan niet meer naar me kijken.Ze verlaat me.Nu zie ik er de humor van in.Nu lach ik altijd.Jij bent een knokker.Daar hou ik van.Dan hou je ook van mij.

Znate, pristajem i na njegove najmilije.Nas ne plase nitkovi.Znas......podsjecas me na moga oca.Mrzio sam ga.Ma dosta.Hej, ljepotice.Ti si Harveyeva prileznica.I bas si prekrasna.Izgledas zivcana. To je zbog oziljaka?Zanima te odakle mi?Doрi. Hej.Pogledaj me.Imao sam zenu. Prekrasnu, poput tebe.Govorila mi da se ne brinem.Govorila mi da se vise smijesim.Kockala je i dobro sezaduzila kod zelenasa.Jednoga dana izrezali joj lice.Novca za operacije nemamo.Ona to ne moze podnijeti.A ja samo zelim opetvidjeti kako se smijesi.zelim da zna da me bas briga za oziljke.I tako si......u usta gurnem britvu i nacinim ovo......sam sebi.I znas sto? Ona me vise ne moze vidjeti.Pa ode.Vidim ja i smijesnu stranu.Stalno se smijesim.Vidim da se malo opires. To mi se sviрa.Znaci mene ces obozavati.

Пусни я.- Много лош избор на думи!Добре ли си?Да не го повтаряме.Харви добре ли е?- В безопасност е.Благодаря ти.- Джим, свършено е.Докато се доберат до Лау,ще замразим фондовете им.С делото е свършено.Никой няма да се яви в съда,докато умират съдиии полицейски комисари.Ами Дент?Ако има поне малко разум,вече ще е на път за Мексико.Къде си пазиш боклуците?Длъжник си на съда.Искам те жив докатоне получа писмени показания.Как ще ме защитите, не можетеда защитите дори себе си?!Ако откажеш да съдействаш,ще те изпратим в окръжния.Можеш ли да пресметнешколко дълго ще оцелееш там?Ако ме вземат на прицел,това няма да им върне парите.Знам, че мафията няма да сепредаде без бой, но това е различно.Преминаха границата.- Вие пръв преминахте границата, сър.Притискахте ги, удряхте ги,до момент на отчаяние.В отчаянието си се обърнаха къмчовек, когото не разбират напълно.Престъпниците не са сложни, Алфред.Трябва да разберем какво иска.С цялото ми уважение, господарю Уейн,вероятно и вие не го разбирате.Преди много време бях в Бирма.Аз и приятелите ми работехмеза местното правителство.Опитваха се да купят лоялносттана лидерите на родовете,подкупвайки гисъс скъпоценни камъни.Но караваните им бяха нападнатив горите на север от Янгон от бандит.Така че ние трябвашеда открием камъните.Но за 6 месеца не отрихме някой,който да ги е изтъргувал.
